articles.title: Tony Finau, Stewart Cink react to Henrik Stenson's Ryder Cup removal | Golf Today | Golf Channel - Golf Channel
articles.description: Kira Dixon catches up with Tony Finau and Stewart Cink ahead of the 3M Open at TPC Twin Cities, as they react to the news that Henrik Stenson is out as 2023 ...
